subject: inner hater
body:
1\. glanced at deborah's computer screen walking by and saw a webinar freeze-framed to a powerpoint slide with the heading "the four 'inner hater' mindsets"

2\. [notes toward a theory of the millennial ambition psycho](https://maxread.substack.com/p/notes-toward-a-theory-of-the-millennial) by max read

3\. first shave with a new razor
